com.brightcove.mobile.android
Interface BCPlayerView.OnPlaybackChangeListener

Enclosing class:
BCPlayerView
public static interface BCPlayerView.OnPlaybackChangeListener

Definition of callbacks that are invoked on changes to the playback state of the BCPlayerView.

Method Summary
 void onStart()
          Called to indicate playback has started.
 void onStop()
          Called to indicate playback has stopped.
